description:
Whether shredding fresh corduroy or gliding through the forest, you can use this wax for all the skis and boards in your fleet.

  • Universal wax for all temperature ranges so you can wax up wherever you are
  • Melt, scrape and wipe is as easy as 1,2,3
  • No solvents mean a better experience for you and the earth
  • 60g size make its great for travel
name: Swix F4 UNIVERSAL GLIDE WAX
